members.member:
This event is to get the creditial in shipping method configuration.
The Shipping Method from the Sales Order or Invoice. Note : If the remaining item is Prepacked, the shipment will use the dimensions of the item. : If the remaining item is OverSized, the shipment will use the shipping method and dimesions of the item.
